attributes.additional_details: I want the government to de classify or legalise cannabis, which ever suits them best, as a country we are struggling to get by; the cannabis trade brings in 3 billion pounds or more a year,  so why are you making criminals out of people that use weed for recreational and religious or meditational purposes, the facts are there for you to see that weed is not bad for you, yet you still seem to suppress it, 3 billion pounds could be made plus tourism from fully legalising!!!
